name: Consoland
description:
Imagine a world controlled entirely by one console... 

In this game it is possible to interact with the world through a console.

For the moment it is possible to place, take, interact, use tools on certain terrains and finally plant new plants... A crafting system and console upgrades are already in the plans to unlock its true potential

For the moment it is only a prototype but in the future it will be a complete game
